bibl.title: The Archive of Athenodoros: and assorted documents of the Augustan period. (Ägyptische Urkunden aus den Staatlichen Museen zu Berlin. Griechische Urkunden. XVI. Band.)
bibl.note: B.G.U. XVI, 2558-3674. - Papyri retrieved from a cartonnage coffin (Abusir el Melek). For the most part, the archive consists of letters written by or addressed to a certain Athenodoros, dioicete over probably a sub-provincial district in the Herakleopolite nome in the middle years of Augustus's rule.
bibl.seg: BRASHEAR William M., The Archive of Athenodoros (and assorted documents of the Augustan period). (Ägyptische Urkunden aus den Staatlichen Museen zu Berlin. Griechische Urkunden. XVI. Band.)
Berlin, Staatliche Museen - Preussischer Kulturbesitz, 1995, 8°, 240 pp. et 6 microfiches. ISBN 3-88609-392-1. DM 60.

B.G.U. XVI, 2558-3674. - Papyri retrieved from a cartonnage coffin (Abusir el Melek). For the most part, the archive consists of letters written by or addressed to a certain Athenodoros, dioicete over probably a sub-provincial district in the Herakleopolite nome in the middle years of Augustus's rule.

C.R. par Étienne Bernand, Gnomon 71 (1999) pp. 158-159. - Alain Martin, ChrEg 73 (1998) No. 145, pp. 172-174. - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, ZSav 116 (1999) pp. 596-599. - Carla Balconi, Aegyptus 78 (1998 [2000]) pp. 213-219.
